items.name: Pubget
items.summary: is a command-line tool to download articles from PubMed Central, extract their content and prepare it for analysis.

items.name: Labelbuddy
items.summary: is a desktop application for labelling text. It is a simple, easily installed local application.

items.name: Labelbuddy-annotations
items.summary: is a repository of annotations created with labelbuddy, on documents collected with pubget.
